duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up and operate basic audiovisual systems in a hospitality environment, ensuring complete customer satisfaction.
Maintain positive relationships with clients through effective communication and strive to exceed their expectations and needs.
Demonstrate technical ability to troubleshoot and problem-solve equipment and software issues in a timely and professional manner.
Understand and follow company processes, procedures, and complete necessary paperwork accurately.
Work in hotel/convention center and warehouse environments, using high-end audio-visual equipment and may work irregular hours, including on-call status, evenings, weekends, and holidays.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma required, Associate’s degree preferred
